name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live ＂LOCK ON＂ 有明アリーナ [DpYSUe6Ca9o]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Opening highlights showing the audience and the venue atmosphere at Ariake Arena.
Opening movie sequence and countdown to the live performance.
Amane Kanata takes the stage and performs the song 'Chou'.

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live LOCK ON
subtitles.english: Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live LOCK ON

subtitles.original: 負けない 絶頂 さきがけ撃ち最強
subtitles.english: Unbeatable, at the peak, the strongest first strike

subtitles.original: 呪われて 愛されて 偽らぬ光を見せて Oh
subtitles.english: Cursed and loved, show me a light that doesn't lie, oh
